Constructor Detail

ClientController

public ClientController(ClientModel model,
                        java.lang.String host,
                        int port)
Creates a new controller that updates a specified model and receives events from the GUI and network.

Parameters:
model - The model to update on events
host - The server host to connect to on login
port - The port on the host to which the controller should connect

ClientController

public ClientController(ClientModel model,
                        Channel serverChannel)
Creates a new controller that updates a specified model and receives events from the GUI and network. This constructor also takes an initial channel to use for server communications (useful for testing).

Parameters:
model - The model to update on events
serverChannel - A channel to the server for the duration of this client session
Method Detail

setChannel

public void setChannel(Channel serverChannel)
Sets the channel that will be used for communicating with the server.

Parameters:
serverChannel - A channel to the server for the duration of this client session

loginPressed

public void loginPressed(java.lang.String loginName)
                  throws ModelInconsistencyException
Login event: occurs when the login button is pressed on the login window. Connects to the server (if not already connected), and sends a login request. Also updates the model with the username.

Throws:
ModelInconsistencyException

logoutPressed

                   throws ModelInconsistencyException
Logout event: logout button was pressed on main window.

Throws:
ModelInconsistencyException

sendImPressed

public void sendImPressed(java.lang.String message,
                          Conversation convo)
Send message event: the "Send" button in a 2-way conversation or chat window was pressed with a message to send

Parameters:
message - The message text typed into the chat window
convo - The conversation associated with the message

public void chatRoomWindowClosed(ChatRoomConversation convo)
IM close event: a chat room window was closed. This event causes a leave chat room request.

Parameters:
